mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, tenant_name, tenant_desc, register_time, mobile_no, vip_level, vip_expire_day, tenant_card_no, status, remark, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, tenant_favicon, tenant_logo, email from sys_tenant_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_tenant_info(tenant_id, tenant_name, tenant_desc, register_time, mobile_no, vip_level, vip_expire_day, tenant_card_no, status, remark, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, tenant_favicon, tenant_logo, email) values (#{tenantId}, #{tenantName}, #{tenantDesc}, #{registerTime}, #{mobileNo}, #{vipLevel}, #{vipExpireDay}, #{tenantCardNo}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{createtime}, #{lastmodifiedtime}, #{tenantFavicon}, #{tenantLogo}, #{email})

insert into sys_tenant_info(tenant_id, tenant_name, tenant_desc, register_time, mobile_no, vip_level, vip_expire_day, tenant_card_no, status, remark, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, tenant_favicon, tenant_logo, email) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.tenantName}, #{entity.tenantDesc}, #{entity.registerTime}, #{entity.mobileNo}, #{entity.vipLevel}, #{entity.vipExpireDay}, #{entity.tenantCardNo}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.lastmodifiedtime}, #{entity.tenantFavicon}, #{entity.tenantLogo}, #{entity.email})

insert into sys_tenant_info(tenant_id, tenant_name, tenant_desc, register_time, mobile_no, vip_level, vip_expire_day, tenant_card_no, status, remark, createtime, lastmodifiedtime, tenant_favicon, tenant_logo, email) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.tenantName}, #{entity.tenantDesc}, #{entity.registerTime}, #{entity.mobileNo}, #{entity.vipLevel}, #{entity.vipExpireDay}, #{entity.tenantCardNo}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.lastmodifiedtime}, #{entity.tenantFavicon}, #{entity.tenantLogo}, #{entity.email})
on duplicate key update tenant_id = values(tenant_id), tenant_name = values(tenant_name), tenant_desc = values(tenant_desc), register_time = values(register_time), mobile_no = values(mobile_no), vip_level = values(vip_level), vip_expire_day = values(vip_expire_day), tenant_card_no = values(tenant_card_no), status = values(status), remark = values(remark), createtime = values(createtime), lastmodifiedtime = values(lastmodifiedtime), tenant_favicon = values(tenant_favicon), tenant_logo = values(tenant_logo), email = values(email)
mapper.update:
update sys_tenant_info
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
tenant_name = #{tenantName},
tenant_desc = #{tenantDesc},
register_time = #{registerTime},
mobile_no = #{mobileNo},
vip_level = #{vipLevel},
vip_expire_day = #{vipExpireDay},
tenant_card_no = #{tenantCardNo},
status = #{status},
remark = #{remark},
createtime = #{createtime},
lastmodifiedtime = #{lastmodifiedtime},
tenant_favicon = #{tenantFavicon},
tenant_logo = #{tenantLogo},
email = #{email},
where id = #{id}
